feed.title: Signature PDF Libre Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Signature PDF Libre: v.1.7.0
entry.content:
Electronic signature

The pdfs are signed with the pdfsig tool (poppler) with an nss certificate.

To activate it you have to generate an nss certificate and install 2 packages, the procedure is described here: https://github.com/24eme/signaturepdf/blob/master/README.md#enabling-digital-signature

The electronic signature is not currently activated in the multiple signature mode.

@teymour

Full Changelog: https://github.com/24eme/signaturepdf/compare/v1.5.1...v1.7.0

entry.title: New release for Signature PDF Libre: v.1.7.1
New release for Signature PDF Libre: v.1.7.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Traductions
  • Bug fixes
  • Updating js and css dependants

Full Changelog: https://github.com/24eme/signaturepdf/compare/v1.7.1...v1.7.2

entry.title: New release for Signature PDF Libre: v.1.7.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix a bug that prevents the pdf from reloading (thanks to @jcarnu)
  • Updated fatfree to version 3.9.0 to be compatible with php 8.4
  • Add new public instance by @louis-vgn in https://github.com/24eme/signaturepdf/pull/130 : https://liber-it.fr/
  • Add new public instance by @rodinux in https://github.com/24eme/signaturepdf/pull/137 : https://signaturepdf.linux07.fr
  • New language Tamil by @TamilNeram
  • Kabyle traduction by @ButterflyOfFire
  • Basque traduction by @xabirequejo

Full Changelog: https://github.com/24eme/signaturepdf/compare/v1.7.2...v1.7.3

entry.title: New release for Signature PDF Libre: v1.7.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • add specific CSS loading if exists, refers to #133 by @jcarnu in https://github.com/24eme/signaturepdf/pull/140

Documentation to customize css here : https://github.com/24eme/signaturepdf?tab=readme-ov-file#customize-the-css

Full Changelog: https://github.com/24eme/signaturepdf/compare/v1.7.3...v1.7.4
